title: BRIEF-Syrah Resources Announces Immediate Head Count Reduction Of About 30% At Balama
text:
BRIEF-Syrah Resources Announces Immediate Head Count Reduction Of About 30% At Balama

Commodities 4 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 19:00)

BRIEF-Syrah Resources Announces Immediate Head Count Reduction Of About 30% At Balama Oct 18 (Reuters) - Syrah Resources Ltd : * STRUCTURAL REVIEW OF CO COMPLETED IN RESPONSE TO A SUDDEN AND MATERIAL DROP IN FLAKE GRAPHITE PRICES DURING Q3 2019 * IMMEDIATE HEAD COUNT REDUCTION OF ABOUT 30% AT BALAMA AND ASSOCIATED STAFF COSTS * IMPLEMENTING SERIES OF MEASURES TO ENABLE CONTINUED BUILD OF SUSTAINABLE BUSINESS IN LITHIUM-ION BATTERY SUPPLY CHAIN * SIGNIFICANT RESTRUCTURE OF CORPORATE EXECUTIVE ROLES HAS BEEN UNDERTAKEN * CURRENTLY PLANNED 2020 PRODUCTION OF 120KT TO 150KT FROM BALAMA * ANNOUNCES IMMEDIATE ACTION TO PRODUCE AT MINIMUM CONTINUAL PRODUCTION LEVELS IN Q4 AT ABOUT 5KT PER MONTH AT BALAMA

BRIEF-Syrah Resources Announces Immediate Head Count Reduction Of About 30% At Balama
description: BRIEF-Syrah Resources Announces Immediate Head Count Reduction Of About 30% At Balama
